actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for retirement savings in the case of persons covered by certain pension plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a limited income tax deduction for retirement savings by persons who are active participants in other retirement benefit plans qualifying for special tax consideration.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for retirement savings in the case of persons covered by certain pension plans.
